roleset.name: put money into a project/investment

example.text: That 's a headache for long - term investors , since it forces them-1 PRO-1 to reinvest their money -- usually at lower rates than the original mortgage securities carried .
example.arg: usually at lower rates than the original mortgage securities carried .

example.name: All args
example.text: Nearly seven of 10 investors think companies reinvest `` too little '' of their profits in the business .
